channel.title: Sessions on Schulich Ignite
channel.description: Recent content in Sessions on Schulich Ignite

item.title: Introduction to Python
item.description: In this session we will give an intro to the coding platform we use and the basics of python. These basics will be the fundamental building blocks of all of our code!

item.title: Functions
item.description: In this session we will look at functions. Functions allow us to organize our code, and make it easier to read and understand.
